The apartment itself is perfect for someone who works from home or a student. All stainless steel appliances, washer and dryer in unit, TWO spacious closets in the bedroom, plus a coat closet in the entryway.
The 1 bedrooms in the complex are currently running for ~$1900, but I locked in an amazing rate for ~$1770 which is what you will be paying for the remainder of the lease term. I would like to move out in May, but am flexible.

description:

This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! title: Just imagine...an adorable, classic brick, traditional Philadelphia
description: Just imagine...an adorable, classic brick, traditional Philadelphia home but with a wide-open floor plan that accommodates the entire first floor. So much so that when you wash your dishes and leave them out, the dish fairy can do her work without disturbing your rest, relaxation, or relatives. Yes, we're talking about that classic library you've built in your space. That indoor/outdoor living room leading you out to a patio where you can grill, entertain, and dine alfresco. Or that dining room that can accommodate three generations of your family, your neighbors, and then some on Thanksgiving. Where are you going to find all this and more, right here at 1605 Kater St. The greatest location in the greatest city on earth. Within one physical block, you'll find The Bakers Jar, Tio Flores, Wine Dive, Bob and Barbara's, Freehouse Fitness, Art Sanctuary Gallery, and the 40 bus that takes you to east Penn's Landing or west to the University of Penn and all the way to the Main Line. Just an 11-minute .5 mile walk to Rittenhouse Square, or a 25 minute 1 mile walk to Passyunk Sq. In addition to the handsome brick fa ade with the most charming curb appeal, and your expansive living room with hardwood floors that lead you to the brick patio, downstairs you'll find that aforementioned dish fairy cleaning your well-appointed kitchen. This kitchen is so well laid out it practically cooks and cleans for you. Adjacent you'll find storage and utility room to store all the things that pinterst inspired you to buy but not to use, like a lifetime supply of cupcake sprinkles, a yoga chair, a sewing machine, and a peloton bike. Shut the door and tuck away all those to-do's. Venture upstairs, toss a bath bomb, and soak your cares away in the freestanding tub in your luxury bathroom with separate stand up shower, and double sinks. This is the perfect bathroom for two people, if that's your thing. Next up, air dry on the second floor deck with a nice fence that allows for you to sun your buns in privacy. Finally, enjoy a nice big bedroom all night long and closets in the morning that will keep your wardrobe organized and wrinkle free.

description: This rarely found one bedroom plus den condo with a full-size PRIVATE ROOF DECK in a convenient Graduate Hospital location checks all the boxes. This beautifully maintained condo features an open concept living and kitchen area with a chic industrial vibe courtesy of exposed ductwork, painted brick accent wall and modern-style kitchen. The kitchen features sleek white cabinetry accented by a muted aquamarine penny tile backsplash and stainless-steel appliances. Bamboo flooring flows throughout the kitchen, living and bedroom areas, unifying the spaces. Right off the living area is a smaller rear deck (perfect for a container garden) with stairs to access the private roof deck. Not only does this roof deck have panoramic, unobstructed Philly skyline views, it is also spacious enough to accommodate large-scale deck furniture. It truly functions as a second living space and with recent mild temperatures you can keep the outdoor living going into the colder months! Back inside the bedroom has two large windows for lots of light and a cool exposed brick accent wall. Just off of the bedroom is the den, which is currently set-up as the walk-in closet of your dreams. It is smartly outfitted with customized wall mounted hanging rods and accessory drawers for a level of closet organization that would make even Marie Kondo jealous! A pocket door connects the den space to the bathroom.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: This immaculate 1-bedroom, 1-bath home with enclosed garage parking
description: This immaculate 1-bedroom, 1-bath home with enclosed garage parking is located in Naval Square, Philadelphia’s premier gated community! Setting it apart from the rest, you will enjoy many significant upgrades in both esthetics and convenience, including upscale designer light fixtures in the dining room, hallway, and bathroom. Custom painted walls throughout, as well as upgraded kitchen and bathroom faucets. The modern kitchen features a breakfast bar with sleek granite countertops, Whirlpool stainless appliance suite, tiled backsplash, and 42” natural cherry cabinetry with ample storage. The tranquil, open concept living/ dining space offers high ceilings, crown moldings, recessed LED lighting & gleaming hardwood floors. A Juliet balcony with French sliding doors provides an abundance of natural light.  Luxurious hall bath features an updated lighting fixture, granite vanity, subway tile shower with a marble shelf, and brand-new shower fixtures. Just off the hall, is a separate linen closet with a full-size, side-by-side washer/dryer as well as a substantial coat closet. Save energy and money with a new hot water heater (2020). The deeded indoor parking spot (#9) and your very own storage unit (3x6x9) are located just steps from the elevator! Featuring almost 1,000 SF, this perfectly maintained home is uniquely located in the Pemberton building- the only building within the community allowing for direct access to a state-of-the-art fitness center and seasonal outdoor pool. The dramatic community room in Biddle Hall rotunda is perfect to reserve for private parties. Enjoy wonderful outdoor amenities- including picnic areas, well-kept gardens & mature landscaping. Naval Square is a pet-friendly, tranquil 20-acre park-like setting, with a concierge, on-site security, on-site management, and gorgeous common spaces. Easy freeway access and close proximity to South Street Bridge, UPenn, CHOP, HUP & Drexel, Rittenhouse & Fitler Sq's! Exceptional location for graduate students, faculty, and residents. Exciting restaurants, shops and cafes, including the brand new Heirloom Market by Giant are all just steps outside the gates. Directly out the back gate you can enjoy the Schuylkill River Park, including the Award Winning Trail & Boardwalk, Markward playground, Tennis Courts & dog park! 800 Admirals Way #1829 is a truly unique home within the most beautifully landscaped community in all of Center City Philadelphia!
